name: n8n AI Workflow Builder
tagline: Build  AI automations & agents using natural language
description: AI Workflow Builder lets you create automations and AI agents from a prompt. Describe what you want, and n8n builds a draft workflow you can refine in the editor. Available on Cloud (Trial, Starter, Pro). Support for Enterprise and self-hosted coming soon.

name: Mailmodo AI
tagline: Complete email marketing with just prompts
description: Run your email marketing in minutes, not hours. With Mailmodo AI, you simply prompt your goals and watch email designs, automations, and reports build themselves. No complex tools, no manual work. Just smarter email marketing with one prompt.

name: Strawberry
tagline: Browser with AI companions that automate web tasks
description: Strawberry is moving into beta and opening up for 10 000 users. It is a self-driving browser with companions that can explore the web, complete workflows, and take real action. It is the easiest way for anyone to build AI Agents, right where you already work.

name: AI Agent Platform by CometChat
tagline: AI Copilot for your website/app. Free for first 500 teams.
description: Get a user-facing AI agent or copilot for your website and apps. Use our Agent Builder or connect your own agent. CometChat takes care of everything- agent, UI, guardrails, notifications, and insights. Scalable, compliant, and enterprise-ready from Day 1.

name: nanochat
tagline: Build your won ChatGPT for $100 on a single GPU
description: nanochat is a full-stack implementation of an LLM like ChatGPT in a single, clean, minimal, hackable, dependency-lite codebase. Run tokenization, pretraining, finetuning, evaluation, inference, and web UI on a single 8XH100 node.

name: Deckless
tagline: Create presentation slides from markdown instantly
description: Deckless is a web-based tool that transforms plain text into presentation slides instantly in real-time. No design needed. Perfect for daily meetings and showing notes when you need to communicate quickly and efficiently without using a presentation software.

name: Bento Grid Generator
tagline: Create beautiful bento layouts online
description: A powerful, free web-based tool for creating stunning Bento-style(apple like) grid layouts. Design, customize, and export beautiful grid compositions with drag-and-drop interface. Perfect for portfolios, social links, and showcases.

name: All Blur
tagline: Instantly blur your screen for privacy or content creation
description: All Blur is a lightweight macOS app that instantly blurs your screen with ⌘+Control+B. Perfect for protecting sensitive information when someone walks by or when creating content (photos and videos) in your workspace.

name: Jotform Salesforce Agent
tagline: AI Chatbot for Salesforce
description: Salesforce Agent turns chat into action, instantly. It can create and update records, qualify leads, manage cases, and more. Built on Jotform AI Agents, it works inside Salesforce, using your logic and data to automate what used to be manual.

name: Meilisearch Chat
tagline: We brought conversational AI to Meilisearch
description: Meilisearch: Unifying your search and AI stack in a single information retrieval platform.

name: Request Video + Data Log Collection
tagline: Resolve issues faster with request video and real-time logs
description: Zight makes it easier for teams to quickly understand and resolve user issues. Each Request Video includes session logs like browser, OS, and network details, giving full context so you can confirm bugs, troubleshoot faster, and deliver clearer solutions.

name: Extruct AI
tagline: Find companies and contacts using natural language
description: Extruct helps you search for companies using complex natural language queries. It enriches company data, including hard to parse unstructured information, and finds and enriches people’s contacts through a waterfall process across more than 20 sources

name: Vance
tagline: World's First AI SuperConnector
description: Vance is an AI super-connector. Talk to him over a call to share your story, background, and what you’re looking for. He then checks his network to see who can help or who’s looking for you and makes the introduction.

name: CRAISEE
tagline: Create anything with AI in one place
description: Generate images, videos, text, and audio with 5,000+ AI models. No more switching tools. No more multiple subscriptions. Everything in one beautiful interface with auto-pick for you task.

name: DoneThat - Where do you spend your time?
tagline: Privacy-first AI time tracker and work coach
description: DoneThat automatically keeps track of your work and helps you set realistic goals. It has many built-in privacy safeguards, an optional social feed, and a team plan. It takes 2min to set up and is fully automated after that. No more manual tracking!

name: FOLQ.ai
tagline: Let a digital friend remind you that you’ve got this
description: Need someone to talk to? FOLQ is your voice-first AI companion, ready to listen anytime. No judgement, no wait, no stigma, just instant support and genuine conversation. Because you should never feel truly alone, no matter the moment.

name: Unlayered
tagline: Literally only forms and signatures
description: Create forms, collect e-signatures, and automate workflows in one platform. AI builds your forms in 60 seconds. Trigger emails, webhooks, CRM updates automatically. Lets you sign envelopes and take action on the data collected. Free forever!

name: ruttl v3
tagline: The AI Visual Feedback Tool
description: Ruttl lets you comment on live sites, review web & mobile apps, & collaborate with your team. It makes collaboration easier between the stake holders leading to shorter feedback loop and faster go to market time

name: KraiNode
tagline: Postman for blockchain RPCs
description: Proxy, test, and monitor JSON-RPC in minutes. Your users hit KraiNode API URLs. We forward safely to upstream nodes.

name: FreeSplit
tagline: Free group expense splitting without limits.
description: FreeSplit helps groups split shared costs without limits. Split expenses equally, or by amount, percentage or shares. FreeSplit then automatically calculates the fewest transactions required for everyone to be repaid, so you can settle debts quickly.
